articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Biden's warning to Iran after tit-for-tat strikes in Syria: ‘US would act…’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: President Joe Biden on Friday warned Iran that the United States would "act forcefully" to protect Americans, after the U.S. military carried out air strikes against Iran-backed forces in retaliation for an attack in Syria. | World News
articles.content: President Joe Biden on Friday warned Iran that the United States would "act forcefully" to protect Americans, after the U.S. military carried out air strikes against Iran-backed forces in retaliation… [+3664 chars]
